title: Handle a Broken Seat Report
description: A fan arrives at their seat to find that it is broken. An agent must relocate them.

tasks.description: Receive a report from an usher about a broken seat, including the seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the details of the issue.

tasks.description: Find the best available comparable seats to relocate the fan to.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds two empty seats in a nearby section.

tasks.description: Reissue the fan's ticket for the new seat location and dispatch an usher to guide them.
Create a work order for the maintenance team to repair the broken seat after the game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the issue for the facility team.
